guide: Kill Team Treasurite members in the Crystal Hollows.
They spawn in the Mithril Deposits and you will need
Heart of the Mountain 4 to go there.
You will gain passive progress in this
by having a pet equipped at all times.
Even a Lvl 100 pet counts for this.

note: Gain coins from the Scavenger Enchantment
guide: Kill mobs with a weapon that you have
Scavenger 3+ applied to.
To progress in this you can:
- Participate in Dragon Fights
- Salvage Ender Pieces at the Draconic Altar
- Kill Lost Adventurers
- Collect secrets in dungeons
For this you need to place down a Chum Bucket
while fishing. It's recommended to use a Chum Rod
as this will gain quicker progress.
Purchase it from Moby on the Desert Island.
§cDon't forget to actually deposit the Chum you fish ;)
Brew a Speed Potion by using either Enchanted Sugar
or an Enchanted Sugar Cane. If you use the Sugar, you'll
need to combine the brewed potion with a Glowstone.
You can get that Glowstone by buying one block
from the Builder and breaking it on your island.
You can get the Enchanted Sugar (Cane) from farming
Sugar Cane or killing pests in the Garden.

note: Obtain a Campfire Cultist Badge I
guide: Visit the Campfire in The Park and do
the Trial of Fire. (140 dps over 10s)
You will need 160 Dark Oak and 1k Spruce
in the progress of this.
Enchant your Ender Armor with Growth 5
and if you still struggle, reforge it
to Titanic at the Blacksmith.
You can also use the Wand of Healing.
You will most likely get this from leveling up
skills for the Skill Average goal.
Remember to actually put the money
you get in the Bank :)
For this you should utilize the Garden.
Melons will unlock at Garden Level 6.
Use the Gardening Axe and its upgrade once you
unlock Melons. You might want to save some copper
to enchant the axe with Sunder.
You can unlock 17/17 Farming Collections,
6/11 Combat Collections, 6/6 Foraging Collections,
14/22 Mining Collections for a total of 43 collections.
You will also get some Fishing Collections.
Talk to Jax in the Hub
under the Weaponsmith
and complete on of his challenges.
You should buy an Artisanal Shortbow
for this.
You should either kill Endermen in
End using your Void Sword (200k) and
Ender Armor for this (buy the Ender Training
Perk from Tyzzo next to the Draconic Altar)
or Spiders in the Spiders Den with a Cleave 5
weapon. You might want to also use the free
Combat XP from Bestiary Miletones for this.
Can be made from Lapis Lazuli Collection 5 (10k),
a drop from fishing, from the Experimentation Table,
and dropped from Ender Nodes in the End (11-13% chance).
This unlocks at 5k Diamond Collection. Use Pure Ores
in the Dwarven Mines for this. Craft it with
1 Enchanted Diamond and 8 Vines (costs 40 Jungle Leaves,
requires Jungle Wood Collection 4 to unlock it in /trades.)
You should use SkyHanni's Trapper features
to make this easier. Use /warp trapper
to get back to Trevor whenever you want.
You will need a bow for this.
Wear Ender Armor enchanted with Growth 5
and wear it in The End.
You can also enchant Mushroom Armor like that
and wear it in The Garden.
Growth 5 requires Enchanting Level 5
and costs 50 Experience Levels per piece.
Reforge your armor to Titanic if needed.
You will most likely get this passively.
Talk to Bramass Beastslayer in The Spiders Den.
Use /be ingame to view your progress once you did that.
Kill Sheeps in the Desert Island (/warp desert)
place as many Sheep Minions as you can and
give them the best fuel and storage you have
access to. Remember to collect them in time.
Grab the Fairy Souls you run across while
doing this Bingo. You can use NEU (/neusouls on)
or TimeDeo's Tutorials on YouTube for help.

note: Kill a t2 Slayer Boss under 80s
guide: Recommended for this either Revenant Horror II
or Tarantula Broodfather II. Use your Ender Armor
and Void Sword (200k) for this.
Do commissions and events in The Dwarven Mines,
claim your daily powder from the Puzzler and
from giving Fetchur the items he asks for.
Fetchurs items are all listed in the Wiki.
Try to do those while a '2x Powder' event is active.
You might want to use the Royal Reforge on your
equipment to gain more powder from events.
You can also fish up and kill Mithril Grubbers
in the Abandoned Quarry (Fishing 6).
§fNo eggs:
Dolphin, Bee, Grandma Wolf, Bingo, Rock, Owl,
Enderman, Tarantula and Oringo pets
§fEggs needed:
Jerry, Rabbit, Pig, Chicken, Bat, Silverfish
To get the Enchanted Eggs needed, kill Chickens
in The Barn till you get the Chicken Head recipe.
Once you get your first Enchanted Egg, put it into
one Chicken Minion to generate more of those over time.
Use the wiki to figure out what Fetchur asks for.
You will need to get into Dwarven Mines to be
able to even talk to him.
For this you'll want to open structure chests
in the Crystal Hollows, do a Nucleus Run
(you will need a Small Gemstone Sack for this to count)
or kill Worms/Scathas.
Talk to Guildford in the Dungeon Hub
and complete 4/4 objectives for 3 races.
Don't forget to talk to Guildford
after each run you do.
